Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Regency Torviscas Apartments Suites in Adeje (Costa Adeje), you'll be minutes from Gran Sur Shopping Center and close to Los Cristianos Beach. This family-friendly aparthotel is within close proximity of Aqualand Costa Adeje and Bobo Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 84 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Flat-screen televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and microwaves, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, a fitness center, and bicycles to rent. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance. The complimentary shuttle will take you to the nearby beach or shopping center.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Regency Torviscas Apartments Suites, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the aparthotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage, laundry facilities, and a safe deposit box at the front desk.


Pets allowed Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4:00 PM Check-out time is 10:00 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Gran Sur Shopping Center - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Aqualand Costa Adeje - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Bobo Beach - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Puerto Colon - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Siam Park - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Torviscas Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Del Duque Beach - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Magma Art and Congress Centre - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Troya Beach - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Veronicas Strip - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Golf Las Americas - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Arona Pyramid - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Las Vistas Beach - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Golf Costa Adeje - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Los Cristianos Beach - 4 km / 2.5 mi

The preferred airport for Regency Torviscas Apartments Suites is Tenerife (TFS-Tenerife South) - 15.1 km / 9.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
